channel.title: So I've seen this before

item.title: So I've seen this before
item.dc:creator: @Wildfire Wildfire
item.description:
@Wildfire wrote:

…But not on my server. It seems almost random, but you get glitched where you can’t attack anyone - And you can still get attacked. But there’s a twist! If you get to 0 HP, you’ll still live and he’ll keep hitting 0s. A logout fixes this. Any ideas what it could be or where to look? 525 source, which means rs2hd/ folder :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2009, 06:26:13 am[/size][hr]Oh, and in PlayerCombat.java, I see this:

int rangeDamage = Misc.random(p.MaxHitRange()); int meleeDamage = Misc.random(p.MaxHitMelee());

Could I do something like:

if (wearing item ID 773) { int rangeDamage = "255"; int meleeDamage = "255"; } else { int rangeDamage = Misc.random(p.MaxHitRange()); int meleeDamage = Misc.random(p.MaxHitMelee()); }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2009, 01:29:38 pm[/size][hr]Bump@

Read full topic
